item.title: Send toots with GitHub Actions
item.description: The rzr/fediverse-action action allows to send a toot in your GitHub Action. name: <NAME> jobs: build: runs-on: <RUN_ON> steps: - name: Publish Toot uses: rzr/fediverse-action@master with: access-token: ${{ secrets.MASTODON_TOKEN }} message: <MESSAGE> host: ${{ secrets.MASTODON_SERVER }} <PIPELINE>: The name of your pipeline. <RUN_ON>: The runner to use, see GitHub’s own documentation for possible values. <MESSAGE>: Message for the toot.
